topics.body:
I have a dumb question; why is it always in science fiction that whenever the human race meets aliens or creates Ai they 99% of the time try to wipe out the human race?

Honestly if the human race were to make human level intelligence AI or meet sapient aliens chances are the first thing that would happen is for people to go "how can I have sex with it?"
